# Explorartoy Analysis



## Normalization of Numeric Values

### Creating a normalization fuction
```{r}
min_max_norm <- function(x) {
  (x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x))
}

```

### Applying normalization to numeric variables
```{r}
fraudTotal.db <- as.data.frame(lapply(fraudTotal.db$amt, min_max_norm))
```




```{r}
#install.packages("dplyr")
#library(dplyr)

fraudTotal.db_norm <- fraudTotal.db %>% mutate_each_(list(~scale(.) %>% as.vector), vars = c("cc_num", "amt", "zip", "lat", "long", "city_pop", "unix_time", "merch_lat", "merch_long"))

head(fraudTotal.db_norm)

```
